text: Rhian Griffiths (born 30 September 1980) is a Welsh darts player who currently plays in British Darts Organisation events. ==Career== Griffiths reached the Semi-final of the 2016 BDO World Trophy, losing to Deta Hedman 6–1. She qualified for the 2017 BDO World Darts Championship, where she lost to Anastasia Dobromyslova in the last 16. ==World Championship results== ===BDO=== * 2017: Last 16 (lost to Anastasia Dobromyslova 1–2) * 2018: Last 16 (lost to Lisa Ashton 0-2) ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:Welsh darts players Category:British Darts Organisation players Category:Sportspeople from Port Talbot Category:1994 births Category:Female darts players
title: Rhian Griffiths
